remarks: Lemma for ~ paddass .  The case when ` p = z ` .  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2012.)
statement:
paddasslem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
paddasslem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
paddasslem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddasslem.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddasslem11 $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ p = z ) /\ ( X C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) /\ z e. Z ) -> p e. ( ( X .+ Y ) .+ Z ) ) $.
